title: PHPfinalKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about PHPfinalKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Prevent inheritance of a class using the
final
keyword:
<?php
final class MyClass {
public $name = "John";
}
// This code will throw an error
class AnotherClass extends MyClass{};
?>
Definition and Usage
The
final
keyword is used to prevent a class from being inherited and to prevent
inherited method from being overridden.
Related Pages
Read more about inheritance in our
PHP OOP - Inheritance Tutorial
.

★
+1
